CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 气味；香味；臭味；嗅觉；（某种特定的）味道；气息；（某物的）气味特征
闻；闻到；嗅；嗅到（气味）；感觉到气味；散发气味；发出…的味道；嗅出；察觉；预感到

synonym.mean: 嗅，闻；察觉到；发出…的气味

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 闻（smell的过去式和过去分词）
闻；发觉；发出气味（smell的ing形式）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，与odour很相近，中性词。可指好闻或不好闻或中性气味。
较正式的典雅用词，常指花妆品、花朵和香料等发出的令人感到新鲜、愉快的香味。
指香燃烧时发出的芳香的烟味。
书面用词，指强烈、浓厚天然或人工制造的香气。
指影响嗅觉、味觉的香气或香味，多用于指食物等独特的味。
书面中性词，侧重气味本身的本质，既可指令人愉快的气味，也可指令人作呕难闻气味。
与smell很接近，但着重某物质或物体所特有的气味，多指好闻的气味。

word_group.brief_definition: 好闻；闻起来味道好；闻起来很香
怀疑事情不妙, 感觉情况不对
享受（或欣赏）常被忽略的事物

word_group.phrase: wake up and smell the coffee

word_group.brief_definition: 玫瑰不叫玫瑰, 依然芳香如故；名称并不是重要的东西
word_group.phrase: a rose by any other name would smell as sweet

word_group.brief_definition: 独特的味道；特殊的气味
不同的味道；清晰可辨的味道

bilingual.source: The dishes do not smell very nice.
bilingual.target: 这些菜闻起来不是很好。

bilingual.source: They can smell food from a long way away.
bilingual.target: 它们能从很远的地方闻到食物。

bilingual.source: As she approached she could smell the different fruit.
bilingual.target: 当她走近时，她能闻到不同的水果。

bilingual.source: It produced a nice smell so he tasted the brown water.
bilingual.target: 它产生了好闻的气味，所以他尝了尝棕色的水。

bilingual.source: Some of these chemicals cause the yucky smell you may notice coming from spoiled food.
bilingual.target: 其中一些化学物质会导致你注意到的变质食物发出的难闻气味。
这些草药闻起来非常芬芳。
这种驱虫剂闻起来很香。
这些小吃闻起来非常开胃。

list.abstract: 《Smell》是2002年1月1日发行的英语歌曲，歌手是Tiger Lillies，收录于专辑《Live In Russia 2000-2001》。

yingyinNormal.en: And it couldn't smell any better in here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里的味道闻起来真棒。

yingyinNormal.en: Oooh, yes. There we are. They smell lovely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，拿出来了闻起来很香。

yingyinNormal.en: That's a real shame, it really does smell fantastic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真可惜，闻着可香了。

yingyinNormal.en: You smell like pine trees. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你闻起来有股松树的香气 。谢谢夸奖。

yingyinNormal.en: That's an A! Let me smell that! That's real, baby!
yingyinNormal.zh: 是个A，让我闻一下，是真的，宝贝！

yingyinNormal.en: Seriously, does anyone buy this? I smell like beets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，有人买这个吗？这闻起来像是甜菜。

yingyinNormal.en: Satisfied? Oh, yeah, now I smell him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 满意了吧？对，我现在闻到他了。

yingyinNormal.en: I can smell carrot soup, too. And me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也闻到了胡萝卜汤的味道。我也是！

yingyinNormal.en: I can smell carrot soup, too. And me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也闻到了胡萝卜汤的味道。我也是！

yingyinNormal.en: I can smell that food truck from up here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在楼上都能闻到楼下小摊的味道。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I can smell dinner. Oh, Mr Fox, hello.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，我闻到了晚餐的味道。噢，狐狸先生，你好啊！

yingyinNormal.en: Dark forces, when it's strong it, almost has a smell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当邪恶力量崛起时，几乎是可以闻到的。

yingyinNormal.en: They can smell fear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们闻得出恐惧。

yingyinNormal.en: What do I smell of? Pedro, you smell of toothpaste. What is your favorite smell? Eggs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么我的气味呢？佩德罗，你闻起来有股牙膏的味道。你最喜欢的气味是什么呢？鸡蛋。

yingyinNormal.en: No no no no, it's potpourri. You're supposed to smell it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，那是干燥花，是用来闻的。

yingyinNormal.en: Granny Pig, you smell nice. Thank you, Grandpa Pig. Granny, Granny, smell this. What is it? It's my perfume. Oh, yes. It's lovely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊，猪爷爷，你闻起来很好闻。谢谢你乔治。奶奶，奶奶，闻这个。这是什么？这是我的香水。哦，是的，很好闻。

yingyinNormal.en: Pedro, you smell of toothpaste. What is your favorite smell? Eggs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么我的气味呢？佩德罗，你闻起来有股牙膏的味道。你最喜欢的气味是什么呢？鸡蛋。

yingyinNormal.en: Whoa, you can smell all that? You have a gift. This is Emile, my brother. He's easily impressed. So you can smell ingredients? So what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你连这个也闻得出来，你太有天分了! 这是大米，我的兄弟，他很容易被小事感动。闻得出食物成分那又怎么样？

yingyinNormal.en: So these have just been sun-dried and they just smell so aromatic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些都是晒干的，闻起来很香。

yingyinNormal.en: Ever since I broke my nose I've never had a sense of smell!
yingyinNormal.zh: 自从我摔断鼻子后，就闻不到味道了！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 嗅觉；闻；气味；嗅；臭味

sense_info_list.en: detect the odor of by means of special cells located in the nose

examination_example.sentence: Why this similarity exists in <highlight>smell</highlight> genes is difficult to explain, for now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前还很难解释为什么嗅觉基因存在这种相似性。

examination_example.sentence: The study also found that the genes for <highlight>smell</highlight> were something shared in friends but not genes for immunity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究还发现，嗅觉基因在朋友之间是共享的，但免疫基因不是。

sense_info_list.en: have or give off an odor

examination_example.sentence: We'd have to put a scent on it to make it <highlight>smell</highlight> like a real rat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们得在它身上放一种气味，让它闻起来像只真正的老鼠。

examination_example.sentence: Said one recorder of events, "The air at twelve leagues' distance <highlight>smelt</highlight> as sweet as a new-blown garden."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位记录事件的人说:“十二里格外的空气闻起来就象新开的花园一样芬芳。”

examination_example.sentence: differentiate <highlight>smells</highlight> better than sizes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 区分气味比区分大小更好。

word_usage.usage: smell用作感官动词，表示“嗅到；闻到”时，通常不用于进行时。
smell可作系动词，其后可直接接形容词，如：smell good

exam_freq_info.chinese: 闻到; 嗅到; 嗅觉

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 嗅觉；闻；气味；嗅；臭味

sense_info_list.en: detect the odor of by means of special cells located in the nose
sense_info_list.zh: 闻到; 嗅到; 嗅觉

examination_example.sentence: By means of vision and <highlight>smell</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过视觉和嗅觉的方式。

examination_example.sentence: They use senses of vision and <highlight>smell</highlight> to capture their prey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们使用视觉和嗅觉来捕捉猎物。

examination_example.sentence: You can't see it, <highlight>smell</highlight> it, or hear it, and people disagree on how precisely to define it, or where exactly it comes from.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你看不见它，闻不到它，听不到它，人们对如何准确定义它，或者它的确切来源存在分歧。

sense_info_list.en: have or give off an odor

word_usage.usage:
smell表“气味”时，为可数名词。
示例：The smells from the kitchen filled the room.
满屋子都是从厨房飘来的气味。

smell表“闻到, 嗅到”，可引申作“觉察到”解，为及物动词。此时smell不用于进行时或被动语态，多与can或could连用。
示例：As soon as we opened the front door we could smell the gas.
我们一打开前门，就闻到了煤气的味道。

smell表“散发出…的气味”时，用作不及物动词，用主动形式表被动意义，常接形容词作表语。
示例：玫瑰闻起来很香。
误 The rose smells well.
正 The rose smells good.

动词短语smell of表示“有...的味道”。
示例：他呼吸中散发出白兰地的气味。
误 His breath smells with brandy.
正 His breath smells of brandy.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 闻到; 嗅到; 嗅觉

精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

word_family.mean: n. 嗅觉；闻；气味；嗅；臭味

examination_example.sentence: I remember the harsh acid <highlight>smell</highlight> of the cleaning solution and the scraping sound of stiff iron brushes against rough brick.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还记得清洁剂强烈的酸味和坚硬的铁刷在粗糙的砖块上摩擦的声音。

sense_info_list.en: detect the odor of by means of special cells located in the nose
sense_info_list.zh: 闻到; 嗅到; 嗅觉

examination_example.sentence: Many children like to <highlight>smell</highlight> things they find or play with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多孩子喜欢闻他们找到的或玩的东西。

word_usage.usage:
smell表“气味”时，为可数名词。
示例：The smells from the kitchen filled the room.
满屋子都是从厨房飘来的气味。

smell表“散发出…的气味”时，用作不及物动词，用主动形式表被动意义，常接形容词作表语。
示例：玫瑰闻起来很香。
误 The rose smells well.
正 The rose smells good.

smell表“闻到, 嗅到”，可引申作“觉察到”解，为及物动词。此时smell不用于进行时或被动语态，多与can或could连用。
示例：As soon as we opened the front door we could smell the gas.
我们一打开前门，就闻到了煤气的味道。

动词短语smell of表示“有...的味道”。
示例：他呼吸中散发出白兰地的气味。
误 His breath smells with brandy.
正 His breath smells of brandy.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 把…嗅嗅看; 把…闻闻看

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 嗅觉；闻；气味；嗅；臭味

examination_example.sentence: Then she caught the <highlight>smell</highlight> of burning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后她闻到了烧焦的味道。

examination_example.sentence: How to remove a bad <highlight>smell</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如何去除异味。

examination_example.sentence: We deep fried fish three days ago in the kitchen, but the unpleasant <highlight>smell</highlight> stays.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三天前我们在厨房炸了鱼，但难闻的味道一直没有消失。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>smelt</highlight> the flowers, looked at the birds, and yeah, I picked many tree leaves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我闻了闻花，看了看鸟，是的，我还摘了很多树叶。

examination_example.sentence: As I cooked dinner, a young male polar bear who was playing in a nearby lake sniffed, and <highlight>smelled</highlight> our garlic bread.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我做饭时，一只正在附近湖里玩耍的年轻雄性北极熊闻了闻我们的大蒜面包。

examination_example.sentence: When buying fish, you should first <highlight>smell</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 买鱼时，你应该先闻一闻。

examination_example.sentence: Fresh fish should <highlight>smell</highlight> sweet: you should feel that you're standing at the ocean's edge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新鲜的鱼应该闻起来很香：你感觉自己就像是站在海边。

sense_info_list.zh: 把…嗅嗅看; 把…闻闻看

exam_freq_info.chinese: 闻到; 嗅到; 嗅觉

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 嗅觉；闻；气味；嗅；臭味

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 好闻；闻起来味道好；闻起来很香

sense_info_list.en: detect the odor of by means of special cells located in the nose
sense_info_list.zh: 闻到; 嗅到; 嗅觉

examination_example.sentence: Can you <highlight>smell</highlight> something burning?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能闻到燃烧的东西吗？

examination_example.sentence: Half of the students put up their hands to show that they could <highlight>smell</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一半的学生举手表示他们能闻到。

examination_example.sentence: I can <highlight>smell</highlight> it. It is the <highlight>smell</highlight> of an apple.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我能闻到，这是苹果的气味。

examination_example.sentence: I just take the <highlight>smells</highlight> of the food coming up from the restaurant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我只是闻着从餐厅里传来的食物的气味。

examination_example.sentence: Tobacco plants gave off a <highlight>smell</highlight> when they were safe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 烟草植物在安全的时候会散发出一种气味。

examination_example.sentence: No one likes a bad <highlight>smell</highlight> that could knock somebody over.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有人喜欢一种能让人昏倒的难闻气味。

sense_info_list.en: have or give off an odor

examination_example.sentence: The milk <highlight>smells</highlight> sour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 牛奶闻起来有酸味。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>smell</highlight> nice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们闻起来不错。

examination_example.sentence: They make our world look and <highlight>smell</highlight> better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们使我们的世界看起来闻起来更好。

word_usage.usage:
smell表“气味”时，为可数名词。
示例：The smells from the kitchen filled the room.
满屋子都是从厨房飘来的气味。

smell表“闻到, 嗅到”，可引申作“觉察到”解，为及物动词。此时smell不用于进行时或被动语态，多与can或could连用。
示例：As soon as we opened the front door we could smell the gas.
我们一打开前门，就闻到了煤气的味道。

smell表“散发出…的气味”时，用作不及物动词，用主动形式表被动意义，常接形容词作表语。
示例：玫瑰闻起来很香。
误 The rose smells well.

动词短语smell of表示“有...的味道”。
示例：他呼吸中散发出白兰地的气味。
